name: bamse
description: Universal Re-frame setup running on Node.js
author: Steven Thonus

scripts.clean: rm -rf resources/server && rm -rf resources/package*.json && rm -rf resources/public/js && rm -rf resources/public/css
scripts.release: npm run clean && cp package*.json resources && npm run sass-prod && shadow-cljs release client server
scripts.sass-dev: node-sass --recursive --output resources/public/css --output-style expanded --source-map true --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss src/sass
scripts.sass: npm run sass-dev && node-sass --watch --recursive --output resources/public/css --output-style expanded --source-map true --include-path node_modules/bootstrap/scss src/sass
